00041 #include "hl_sha256.h"

00044 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00045 //STL includes
00046 #include <string>

00048 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00049 //private memberfunctions
00050 
00057 std::string sha256wrapper::hashIt(void)
00058 {
00059         sha2_byte buff[SHA256_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH];
00060         sha256->SHA256_End(&context,(char*)buff);
00061 
00062         return convToString(buff);
00063 }
00064 
00073 std::string sha256wrapper::convToString(unsigned char *data)
00074 {
00075         /*
00076          * we can just copy data to a string, because 
00077          * the transforming to hash is already done
00078          * within the sha256 implementation
00079          */
00080         return std::string((const char*)data);
00081 }
00082 
00090 void sha256wrapper::updateContext(unsigned char *data, unsigned int len)
00091 {
00092         this->sha256->SHA256_Update(&context,data,len);
00093 }
00094 
00099 void sha256wrapper::resetContext(void)
00100 {
00101         sha256->SHA256_Init(&context);
00102 }
00103 
00104 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00105 //public memberfunctions
00106 
00110 sha256wrapper::sha256wrapper()
00111 {
00112         this->sha256 = new SHA256();    
00113 }
00114 
00118 sha256wrapper::~sha256wrapper()
00119 {
00120         delete sha256;
00121 }
